title: We Get What We Deserve.,  Oct 25th 2016
description: The Warren Markowitz Show, It's My World You Just Live In It. A soap box for Independent Ideas, current events and politics of the day. We Get What We Deserve. The political season draws quickly to a close, as the major party candidates continue to battle for support of the undecided voter. Is change in the air? Are there issues that are truly impactful? Has America made it to actual appathay or do we not care anymore? Let's find out, maybe kick the idea around and see where we can go with this. Podcast: Spreaker.com Contact: Radio@warrenmarkowitz.com Follow us on twitter.com/radiomarkowitz & Facebook.com/radiomarkowitz Spreaker-www.spreaker.com/show/the-warren-markowitz-show & our new home on Redstatetalkradio.com Support the podcast, use the next level of autonomy, cryptocurrency: BTC: Azen7A8rsEwQ84SCB3ZsbuYALpNCGgqNc
dc:creator: Warren Markowitz
